Our priority is to help our investors to grow their funds into huge amount of funds and  endeavor that our Investors attain financial freedom and financial breakthrough and also to make our active investors to become Financially stable and buoyant. Beacon Investments, the smart high-frequency and algorithmic investment platform. We're absolutely unique and high-tech company, covering several most profitable and relevant business lines of various profitability at once. The main activity of the company is the development and operation of high-tech software and equipment used in various fields of medium- and high-profitable business operating through the Internet world network. The company has a wide range of unique financial offers for clients. These offers won't allow to stay indifferent even the most demanding specialists in the field of investment and network business development. Read More THE MISSING PIECE At the current moment in history the industry of trading has reached an important moment in the evolution of trading pool investment. Companies often offer investment plans designed by experts in specific fields. However, the specificity of their expertise creates a tunnel vision for the field. This inevitably leads to underdiversified portfolios. These in turn lead to unnecessary risk for the customers. DIVERSIFYING SAFETY Diversification is a crucial component in reaching long-term financial goals while minimizing risk. That is why, systematic risk aside, world class investors make sure to build their portfolios by investing in various assets that are not interconnected. Separate portfolio items will not all be affected the same way by specific market events, raising the core reliableness of the portfolio itself. THE Beacon Investments BUNDLE Beacon Investments is an investment platform that pools its user funds together and builds low-risk / high-reward investment systems that are based on diversification as protection against any single market fluctuations. Using this method of fund allocation, the Beacon Investments team is able to invest in ventures with higher profit margins without taking noticeable blows to the reliability of the program as a whole. OUR INVESTMENT PLANS BEGINNER PLAN ROI 3% TIME: 24 Hours INVEST STANDARD PLAN ELITE PLAN ADVANCED PLAN VIP PREMIUM PLAN PRO PLAN LIVE MARKET CHART HOW IT WORKS The development and management of a large scale investment portfolio is an incredibly complicated endeavour. Notwithstanding, the system that we have developed consists of three simple steps, if we look at the process from your - our customers' - perspective POOLING OF FUNDS The money gathered from our customers is used to form a large scale portfolio for investing. In order to more effectively take actions across markets not only using using fiat but crypto as well, we use bitcoin as payment processor. INVESTMENT ACTIVITIES The investment portfolio is put to use within different financial fields. This is done to decrease the volatility of the investment plan as a whole, as well as to utilize the high returns of more dynamic markets. DAILY RETURNS A part of the profits made by the investment activities is redistributed to shareholders as daily accruals. The remaining sum is reinvested and used to build a reserve fund to insure our customers against profit decreases. thought: The website claims to offer unusually high returns on investment, which is a characteristic of a scam website. The text also seems to target human psychological weaknesses by promising financial freedom and passive income. The payment methods and investment plans are also unusual. Based on these observations, I believe the website is a scam. {
